fd:scripts.fd:init: [{"script":{"content":"//fetch progress meeting details from ea and district\\nvar params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar actualData=JSON.parse(window.atob(params.get('input')));\\n//console.log(actualData);\\nea.value=actualData.ea;\\ndistrict.value=actualData.district;\\nvar jsonData={'ea':ea.value\,'district':district.value};\\nxmlData = OBJtoXML1({\\"data\\":jsonData});\\n//console.log(jsonData);\\n$.ajax({ \\n type: 'POST'\,\\n headers: {\\n 'Content-Type' : 'application/xml'\,\\n 'Accept' : '*/*'\\n }\,\\n url: 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080'+'/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/GetProgressMeetingDetails'\,\\n data: xmlData\,\\n success: function (data) { \\n count=parseInt(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"GetRowCount\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n if(count>0){\\n jsonResponse = JSON.parse(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"PMDetailsJson\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n \\t//console.log(jsonResponse);\\n \\t//console.log(count);\\n if(count===1){ \\n ProgressDashTable.Row1.instanceManager.addInstance(1);\\n ProgressDashTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item1.value=jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record.PROGRESS_MEETING_ID;\\n ProgressDashTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item2.value=jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record.PROGRESS_MEETING_DATE;\\n ProgressDashTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item3.value=jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record.CHAIR_ADVISOR_REPORT;\\n ProgressDashTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item4.value=jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record.RE_RESPONSE;\\n ProgressDashTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item5.value=jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record.CONTRACTOR_RESPONSE;\\n ProgressDashTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item6.value=jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record.FINAL_STATUS;\\n ProgressDashTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].visible=true;\\n }\\n else{\\n for(var i=0; i<count; i++){\\n ProgressDashTable.Row1.instanceManager.addInstance(1);\\n //console.log(jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record[i].PROGRESS_MEETING_ID);\\n ProgressDashTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item1.value=jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record[i].PROGRESS_MEETING_ID;\\n ProgressDashTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item2.value=jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record[i].PROGRESS_MEETING_DATE;\\n ProgressDashTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item3.value=jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record[i].CHAIR_ADVISOR_REPORT;\\n ProgressDashTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item4.value=jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record[i].RE_RESPONSE;\\n ProgressDashTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item5.value=jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record[i].CONTRACTOR_RESPONSE;\\n ProgressDashTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item6.value=jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record[i].FINAL_STATUS;\\n ProgressDashTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].visible=true;\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n }\,\\n error: function(err){\\n alert(\\"something went wrong\\");\\n }\\n});"\,"event":"Initialize"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.progressmainPanel.progressDashboard.progressMeeting"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":false}]

[{"script":{"content":"if(PMIDNoValueFR.value.replace(\\"

\\"Date\\": PMDateSubFR.value\,\\n \\"REName\\": PMRENameFR.value\,\\n \\"REPhoneNo\\": PMREPhoneNoFR.value\,\\n \\"ContractorName\\": PMConNameFR.value\,\\n \\"ProgressMeetID\\":PMIDNoFR.value\\n };\\n jsonData.userRole=userRole.value;\\n jsonData.templateName=\\"CEM6210.xdp\\";\\n jsonData.ea=ea.value;\\n jsonData.district=district.value;\\n jsonData.DRType=PMSelectDRABFR.value;\\n var meetDate = PMMeetDateFR.value;\\n if(PMMeetDateFR.value === \\"null\\" || PMMeetDateFR.value === \\"\\" || PMMeetDateFR.value === null){\\n meetDate = \\"1900-01-01\\";\\n }\\n jsonData.ProgMeet={\\n \\"MeetInfoMeetingDate\\":meetDate\,\\n \\"Meetheld\\":PMMeetHeldFR.value\,\\n \\"MeetLoca\\":PMMeetLocFR.value\,\\n \\"CaltransRep\\":PMCaltransRepFR.value\,\\n \\"ContractorRep\\":PMContractorRepFR.value\,\\n \\"CalDRBMember\\":PMCalDRBMemFR.value\,\\n \\"CalDRBMemberCK\\":PMCalDRBMemCkFR.value\,\\n \\"ConDRBMember\\":PMConDRBMemFR.value\,\\n \\"ConDRBMemberCK\\":PMConDRBMemCkFR.value\,\\n \\"ThirdDRBMember\\":PMThirdDRBMemFR.value\,\\n \\"ThirdDRBMemberCK\\":PMThirdDRBMemCkFR.value\,\\n \\"DRAMember\\":PMDRAAttendeFR.value\,\\n \\"WorkStatus\\":PMStatusWorkFR.value\,\\n \\"PotProblems\\":PMPotProblemFR.value\,\\n \\"PotClaims\\":PMPotClaimFR.value\,\\n \\"PotClaimsStatus\\":PMStatusPotClaimDisputeFR.value\\n };\\n var AttendListArr=[];\\n var Attendist = PMAttendPanelFR.instanceManager.instances;\\n for(var i=0;i < PMAttendPanelFR.instanceManager.instanceCount;i++){\\n var checkbool = Attendist[i].PMAttendNameFR.value!==null || Attendist[i].PMAttendJobTitleFR.value!==null || Attendist[i].PMAttendCheckFR.value!==null;\\n if(checkbool){\\n var eachAttend={};\\n eachAttend.name=Attendist[i].PMAttendNameFR.value;\\n eachAttend.jobtitle=Attendist[i].PMAttendJobTitleFR.value;\\n eachAttend.attendType=Attendist[i].PMAttendCheckFR.value;\\n AttendListArr.push(eachAttend);\\n }\\n }\\n jsonData.AttendDetails=AttendListArr;\\n //RE data\\n jsonData.CalResponse={\\n \\"ResponseCK\\" : PMCalResponseREFR.value\,\\n \\"ResponseDate\\" : PMDateCalResponseREFR.value\,\\n \\"Name\\" : PMCalNameREFR.value\,\\n \\"JobTitle\\" : PMCalTitleREFR.value\,\\n \\"Comments\\" : PMCommentsREFR.value\\n };\\n //Contractor data\\n jsonData.CONResponse={\\n \\"ResponseCK\\" : PMConResponseCONFR.value\,\\n \\"ResponseDate\\" : PMDateConResponseCONFR.value\,\\n \\"Name\\" : PMConNameCONFR.value\,\\n \\"JobTitle\\" : PMConTitleCONFR.value\,\\n \\"Comments\\" : PMCommentsCONFR.value\\n };\\n jsonData.username=\\"\\";\\n jsonData.userID=userID.value; jsonData.HostPath=window.location.protocol+\\"//\\"+window.location.hostname+\\":\\"+window.location.port;\\n url = 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/GenProgMeetFinalReport';\\n xmlData = OBJtoXML1({\\"data\\":jsonData});\\n $.ajax({ \\n type: 'POST'\,\\n headers: {\\n 'Content-Type' : 'application/xml'\,\\n 'Accept' : '*/*'\\n }\,\\n url: url\,\\n data: xmlData\,\\n success: function (data) { \\n PMSucNoteFR.visible=true;\\n PreviewDRBA.visible=true;\\n PMErrNoteFR.visible=false;\\n }\,\\n error: function(err){\\n //this block is executed when server encounters any problem \\n PMSucNoteFR.visible=false;\\n PreviewDRBA.visible=false;\\n PMErrNoteFR.visible=true;\\n }\\n });\\n}\\nelse{\\n \\n}"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.progressmainPanel.finalReport_panel.GenerateFinalPMPDF"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true},{"script":{"content":"console.log(PMIDNoValueFR.value.replace(\\"
